meanings.sent1: She won the game because her collection was the marbliest.
meanings.sent2: The marbliest jar contained all the colorful marbles.
meanings.sent3: The marbliest player in the tournament was declared the champion.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes sparkled like the marbliest gems in the sunlight.
meanings.sent5: The marbliest dress at the party caught everyone's attention.

meanings.sent1: The marbliest statue in the museum was a sight to behold.
meanings.sent2: The marbliest column in the building was intricately carved.
meanings.sent3: The marbliest cake at the bake sale sold out quickly.
meanings.sent4: His voice echoed through the hall, the marbliest sound of all.
meanings.sent5: The marbliest painting in the gallery was worth a fortune.

meanings.sent1: The marbliest floor in the mansion was polished to perfection.
meanings.sent2: The marbliest countertop in the kitchen gleamed under the lights.
meanings.sent3: The marbliest clouds in the sky looked like cotton candy.
meanings.sent4: Her skin had the marbliest texture, smooth and cool to the touch.
meanings.sent5: The marbliest sculpture in the park was a masterpiece of art.
